item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, November 15, 2024 at 7:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Biological Miracle – Wood Frog (19 points | 5 comments)
2. Seer: A GUI front end to GDB for Linux (205 points | 132 comments)
3. Show HN: Free mortgage analysis tool to avoid getting screwed by closing costs (28 points | 1 comment)
4. Show HN: Scooter – Interactive find and replace in the terminal (57 points | 30 comments)
5. Building LawStar – a year long indie hacking journey (34 points | 10 comments)
6. The Battle Line at Louvain (86 points | 49 comments)
7. Show HN: OnAir – create link, receive calls (149 points | 57 comments)
8. Pex: A tool for generating .pex (Python EXecutable) files, lock files and venvs (20 points | discuss)
9. MomBoard: E-ink display for a parent with amnesia (1759 points | 216 comments)
10. Thomas E. Kurtz has died (253 points | 71 comments)
11. FBDetect: Catching Tiny Performance Regressions at Hyperscale [pdf] (38 points | 10 comments)
12. Norwegian fishermen hunting for halibut caught a US nuclear sub (77 points | 56 comments)
13. Please stop the coding challenges (129 points | 270 comments)
14. Upcoming Hardening in PHP (286 points | 113 comments)
15. Manual for PUB (a markup language in 1971) – Larry Tesler (52 points | 11 comments)
16. Modern Treasury (YC S18) Is Hiring a Product Designer ( | hide)
17. Something weird is happening with LLMs and chess (563 points | 381 comments)
18. Speculations on arenas and custom strings in C++ (26 points | 4 comments)
19. Gliimly is a programming language for web services (3 points | 2 comments)
20. Chemist Identifies Mystery 'Blobs' Washing Up in Newfoundland (4 points | 1 comment)
21. Bluesky says it won't train AI on your posts (4 points | discuss)
22. Virality in cartography: What makes a map go viral? (46 points | 11 comments)
23. The cochlear implant question (44 points | 75 comments)
24. 100-MW solar farm just broke ground in Wisconsin (24 points | 38 comments)
25. The letter ℘: name and origin? (2017) (266 points | 123 comments)
26. SNES and Playstation Cubic Adpcm Interpolation (22 points | 8 comments)
27. The OpenFlexure 3D printable microscope (160 points | 17 comments)
28. First generation and control of skyrmions at room temperature in a 2D material (5 points | discuss)
29. SQLite Index Visualization (271 points | 23 comments)
30. The brain summons deep sleep for healing from life-threatening injury (334 points | 216 comments)
